번역: 그녀는 내 전화를 받기 전에 잠시 망설였어요.

영문: You can't touch this before me.
번역: 나보다 먼저 이걸 건드리면 안 돼요.

영문: Wash your hands before sitting.
I saved it on my phone before I forget.
After you.
Make sure to stretch your body after exercising.
I think differently after the long trip.
I gained weight after eating a lot of junk food.
번역: 정크푸드를 많이 먹고 나서 살이 쪘어요.

영문: I feel better after talking to you.
After our conversation, we decided to break up.
He seems happy after getting a job.
I have a habit of turning on TV as soon as I get home.
번역: 집에 오자마자 TV를 켜는 습관이 있어요.

영문: Get out of the building as soon as possible.
번역: 가능한 한 빨리 건물 밖으로 나가세요.

영문: The price went down as soon as I bought it.
She came as soon as I started eating.
He got angry as soon as he arrived here.
I smelled something weird as soon as I entered the room.
I felt sick as soon as I ate the food.
Although you are over 30, you look like around 27.
She is so nice to me although she doesn't know me well.
번역: 그녀는 나를 잘 몰라도 나에게 정말 친절해요.

영문: Although I failed the exam, I will keep trying.
Although it's expensive, I will buy it anyway.
Although it is midnight, I can still stay a little bit more.
번역: 자정이지만 아직 조금 더 있을 수 있어요.

영문: Although I didn't know it, I pretended to know it.
Although I finished my work late, I wasn't late for Culcom.
번역: 일을 늦게 끝냈지만 컬컴에는 늦지 않았어요.

영문: We became friends while I was in college.
번역: 대학에 다니는 동안 우리는 친구가 되었어요.

영문: Write down your name while you are waiting.
I listened to music while I was driving.
She got a new boyfriend while I was having a hard time.
번역: 내가 힘들어할 때 그녀는 새 남자친구가 생겼어요.

영문: You can do your homework while I'm having my lunch.
번역: 내가 점심 먹는 동안 숙제를 해도 돼요.

영문: Talking on the phone is dangerous while walking.
Don't text me while studying.
If I had enough money, I would buy it.
If I knew it, I wouldn't do that.
번역: 그걸 알았더라면 그렇게 하지 않았을 거예요.

영문: If I could meet you earlier, I wouldn't waste my time.
번역: 당신을 더 일찍 만났더라면 시간을 낭비하지 않았을 거예요.

영문: If I exercised harder, I would be more slender.
번역: 운동을 더 열심히 했더라면 더 날씬했을 거예요.

영문: If I were you, I would choose red.
If I had much time, I would travel a lot.
번역: 시간이 많았다면 여행을 많이 했을 거예요.

영문: If I were younger, I would ask you out.
번역: 내가 더 어렸다면 당신에게 데이트 신청했을 거예요.
